doc.title: Distemper
doc.plot: John is a cantankerous old man. He has the heart of a lion but (unfortunately) hasn't the patience to allow anyone else to recognize it. He is madly, desperately in love with BETH, even after many years of marriage. While the ideas of marital roles have changed over the years, John's have not. He still sees himself as the conqueror, the hero and the provider, even though life seems to have left him far behind. JOHN has recently awakened in the midst of technological advances and ideological metamorphoses he can neither understand nor become a part of; he has discovered that he is powerless to stop the forces against him; that he is, indeed, an old man with little left to lose and nothing left to gain.,
